name: Nualea
description:
This is a simple little game where you fight your enemies by hopping on them. But be aware, they will also try to defeat you!

Tutorial

You can move to any tile that is highlighted with a green border. To defeat a enemy just move onto their tile. Click on a enemy to see where they can move. If they move onto you, you lose.

Story

The game is named after the planet where your little fungoid protagonist stranded Nualea. He's originally from the planet Huproth in the same solar System. 

While he was orbiting Nualea with his little spaceship to make investigations for a future colony, his spaceship broke down. But he successfully landed due to emergency mechanisms in his spaceship. Now he is stranded in a potentially habitable planet and needs to explore and survive.

Art

The Art in this game is made by Flaming3Z.

Here's his Twitter: https://twitter.com/flaming3Z
